name: ASOCIACION ESPAÑOLA DEL GAS
goal:
Sedigas has established itself as the representative body for the natural gas sector in the country and to become the interlocutor in this matter with national, regional and international authorities.
As well as, SEDIGAS aim to become a key player in promoting the use of natural gas.

in order to fulfill this goal, SEDIGAS promotes knowledge dissemination on technical matter regarding natural gas.
euInitiatives:
As a stakeholder, SEDIGAS monitors the initiatives that the Euroepa Union carries out on issues related to natural gas.

in the recent years we follow up the Clean Energy package.
Now we are engaging with the first steps in the next Gas package.
